scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "frontend,desktop" -c "cyan,magenta" "yarn workspace @eqivo/frontend dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop dev && VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop start"
scripts.dev:desktop: yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop dev && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop start
scripts.build: yarn workspace @eqivo/frontend build && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop build
scripts.dist:mac: yarn workspace @eqivo/frontend build && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop build && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop dist:mac
scripts.dist:win: yarn workspace @eqivo/frontend build && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop build && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop dist:win
scripts.dist:all: yarn workspace @eqivo/frontend build && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop build && yarn workspace @eqivo/desktop dist:all
